Folder.Title: Programmers Guide
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following examples:
- Introduction - Loading, Saving and Converting - Working with Images - Working with Pages - Working with Text

Folder.Title: Loading, Saving and Converting
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following examples:
- Converting OneNote Document to PDF - Converting OneNote to Image

Folder.Title: Converting OneNote to PDF
Folder.Description:
Aspose.Note for .NET offers the Document class that represents a OneNote file. The Document class exposes the Save method that can be called to convert a OneNote document into a PDF document. The PdfSaveOptions class provides options for creating the PDF such as PageIndex, PageCount and others.
This section contain the following examples:
- Save with the default settings. - Save the range of pages as PDF.

Example.Title: Save with the default settings
Example.Description: The following example shows how to convert a OneNote into a PDF document using the default options. The default options create a PDF document of maximum quality.

Example.Title: Save the range of pages as PDF
Example.Description: The following example shows how to convert a OneNote into a PDF document with a specified page range as provided by the PdfSaveOptions class. It sets the PageIndex and PageCount properties.

Folder.Title: Converting OneNote to Image
Folder.Description:
This section includes how to:
- Save OneNote as image with the default settings. - Save a particular page of OneNote as image.

Example.Title: Converting OneNote to Image using the Default Options
Example.Description: The following example shows how to convert a OneNote into an image using the default options using Aspose.Note for .NET.

Example.Title: Converting a Specific Page in a OneNote Document to Image
Example.Description: The following example shows how to convert a specific page in a OneNote file into an image using the ImageSaveOptions class in Aspose.Note for .NET. It sets the PageIndex properties.

Folder.Title: Working With Images
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following topics:
- Extract Images from a OneNote Document - Get Information of Each Image from the OneNote Document

Example.Title: Extract Images From A OneNote Document
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can extract images from a OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

DocLink.DisplayName: Extract Images from a OneNote Document

Example.Title: Get Information Of Each Image From The OneNote Document
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can get information of each image from a OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

DocLink.DisplayName: Get Information of Each Image from the OneNote Document

Folder.Title: Working With Pages
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following topics:
- Get Number of Pages from the OneNote Document - Get Information of Each Page from the OneNote Document

Example.Title: Get Number Of Pages From The OneNote Document
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can get the number of pages from a OneNote file using Aspose.Note for .NET.

DocLink.DisplayName: Get Number of Pages from the OneNote Document

Folder.Title: Working With Text
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following topics:
- Extract Text from OneNote Document - Replace Text in Pages of a OneNote Document

Folder.Title: Extract Text From OneNote Document
Folder.Description: One of the tasks that developers need to perform is extracting text from a OneNote document. Aspose.Note for .NET allows developers to extract text from a OneNote document in various ways.

Example.Title: Extracting All Text From OneNote Document
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can extract all the text from OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

Example.Title: Extracting Text From A Specified Page Of A OneNote Document
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can extract text from a specified page in a OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

Folder.Title: Replace Text In Pages of a OneNote Document
Folder.Description:
This section includes the following topics:
- Replace text on all pages. - Replace text on a particular page.

Example.Title: Replace Text On All Pages
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can replace text on all pages of OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

DocLink.DisplayName: Replace Text in Pages of a OneNote Document

Example.Title: Replace Text On A Particular Page
Example.Description: In this example, we will see how we can replace text on a particular page of a OneNote document using Aspose.Note for .NET.

DocLink.DisplayName: Replace Text in Pages of a OneNote Document
